Fully automated and looking nice

GrowBox for 1 Plant *

Lightning

Controllable light composition: 3500K full spectrum, 385nm, 450nm, 660nm, 730nm by Crescience

Watering

Weight-controlled flower pot for optimal watering conditions. 15l tank for 14 days self-sufficiency.

Robust design

Solid construction with HPL paneling. Suitable for living room, carport or basement.

Heating & Cooling

Cool down or heat up the system to achieve stable conditions for your plants.

Airflow

No more mold on your buds thanks to ventilation from above and below.

Optimal sizing

Perfect size for a plant up to 1.5 meters tall. Perfect match for regular and autoflowering seeds.

Self optimized light positioning

Automatic height adjustment of the lamp using camera-based plant measurement.

Smart

Fully automated but adjustable down to the smallest details for individual growing projects.
